author: Aric Jenkins
description: Greg Gianforte was charged with misdemeanor assault
title: Reporter Claims Montana GOP House Candidate Greg Gianforte 'Body Slammed' Him

author: BBC News
description: Montana candidate Greg Gianforte faces a misdemeanour charge over a clash with a Guardian journalist.
title: US Republican Greg Gianforte charged over Guardian reporter 'body slam'

author: Alicia Shepard
description: Donald Trump made the media the "enemy of the people" during his campaign. Greg Gianforte body slammed a Guardian journalist last night, reminding us how important our First Amendment is.
title: Greg Gianforte's assault on a journalist is an assault on all Americans

author: Jethro Mullen
description: The alleged assault of Guardian reporter Ben Jacobs by Republican congressional candidate Greg Gianforte set social media alight on Wednesday night.
title: Twitter erupts over GOP candidate Greg Gianforte's alleged assault on reporter

author: Spiegel Online
description: Der Republikaner Greg Gianforte soll einen Reporter des "Guardian" zu Boden geworfen und seine Brille zerstört zu haben. Spitzenpolitiker Paul Ryan steht dennoch zu ihm.
title: Greg Gianforte: Mutmaßliche Prügelattacke - Republikaner halten an Parteifreund fest

author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
description: On the eve of Montana's special House election, Republican nominee Greg Gianforte got into a physical altercation with a reporter from The Guardian newspaper -- an incredibly odd and potentially damaging last-minute swerve in a race that has, of late, attracted considerable national attention and money.
title: Greg Gianforte just made a massive error on the final night of the Montana special election

author: Mark Abadi
description: The governor of Montana accused Republican Greg Gianforte of lying as news of Gianforte's attack on a journalist threatens to derail his campaign.
title: Montana governor: It's 'unsettling on many levels' that candidate for GOP House seat lied about assaulting reporter

author: https://www.facebook.com/hadas.gold
description: “Get the hell out of here,” Greg Gianforte is heard yelling.
title: Reporter: Montana House GOP candidate  'body-slammed' me

description: A Guardian reporter says he was body slammed by Greg Gianforte, the Republican candidate in Montana's special congressional election. Gianforte has been charged with assault.
title: Candidate charged with assaulting reporter - CNN Video

author: Eliza Relman
description: On the eve of a competitive special election in Montana, the Republican candidate, Greg Gianforte, was charged with assaulting a reporter at a campaign event.
title: 'I'm sick and tired of you guys!': Audio records GOP House candidate from Montana yelling at reporter as he 'body slams' him
